author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Regional Transport Office is collecting road tax for non-transport vehicles, including two-wheelers, cars, cranes and JCB for 2016-17 at the designated places till April 10.

Officials said that special counters would function on all days, except on Sundays and government holidays and vehicle users can pay the road tax for the year starting from April 1, 2016 to March 31, 2017. Tax payment is accepted till April 10 without fine and vehicle owners should produce the registration certificate and insurance policy in original.

The tax schedule would be exhibited at all the collection counters, they added.

Tax can be paid at the RTO office in Namakkal South, Namakkal North, Tiruchengode and Motor Vehicle Inspector office at Paramathi Velur and Rasipuram.
title: Special counters for collection of road tax
